nodes.text: The Chadawan navy was the naval force of the Chadawan government, a remnant of the Galactic Empire located on Chadawa and headed by Governor Bordanivaux. The Chadawan navy defended the Chadawa system from both the Empire during Operation: Cinder, and the New Republic Defense Fleet during the Battle at Chadawa. At some point, they were joined by the former Imperial officer Colonel Madrighast of the ISD Unyielding, whom Governor Bordanivaux had offered refuge. Madrighast and his unit joined the Chadawan navy and assisted in the system's defense.
